summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Bank Statement Converter MVP for Portugal. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend testing shows excellent Portuguese localization, proper authentication flows, subscription management, and Stripe integration. All major features working correctly including user registration/login, dashboard, pricing plans, and PDF upload interface.
passed_tests: User registration with email, password, and name
User login with JWT token generation
Landing page displays correctly with Portuguese text
All three supported banks displayed (BPI, Millennium, Caixa Geral)
Pricing page shows correct plans (Free, Starter €30, Pro €99)
Dashboard shows subscription usage and limits correctly
PDF upload interface properly configured for PDF files
Bank selection dropdown working with all three banks
Stripe checkout session creation and redirect working
Protected route access control after logout
All backend APIs returning correct status codes
Portuguese language implementation throughout the app

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (minor timeout issue resolved in second test)
